genre_description: A contemporary sports drama set in a world where pervasive AI assistants are seamlessly integrated into educational, athletic, and legal institutions to provide logistical and personal support.

ai_characters.name: Olive
ai_characters.description: A pervasive AI system accessed via tablets, phones, and school infrastructure that manages logistics, scouting, legal research, and personal scheduling for students and staff.

behaviors.description: Manages practice schedules, study hall reminders, and prepares scouting reels for the coach and players.
behaviors.quote: “Good afternoon, Coach. Practice blocks set. Study hall reminders queued. Scouting reel ready.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes basketball game film in real-time, providing tactical adjustments and highlighting player 'tells' or weaknesses in the opponent.
behaviors.quote: Olive: Garfield corner trap—possession one. Overlay: pass network. Note: weak-side defender stunts, then retreats.

behaviors.description: Coordinates childcare logistics, diaper stock reminders, and transportation for a student-parent to balance school and motherhood.
behaviors.quote: Olive: Malik—childcare swap with Mrs. Alvarez confirmed for post-practice window. ... Malik: Olive, don’t forget diaper stock.

behaviors.description: Assists legal counsel by compiling bylaws, researching case law precedents, and drafting motion outlines for an emergency injunction.
behaviors.quote: “I am compiling relevant bylaws and case law. Litigation pathways listed in your team folder.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a writing assistant, helping the protagonist draft professional and appropriate responses to college recruiters.
behaviors.quote: “You used ‘means a lot’ in the last two drafts,” Olive said, warm but aware. “Option: ‘I appreciate you taking the time to watch my film.’”

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors for external risks, such as hostile press inquiries or donor interference, and alerts the team.
behaviors.quote: Olive highlighted a name on the screen with a thin teal underline. “Gregory Barnes is cc’d,” she said. “Thread started in a booster distribution list.”

behaviors.description: Provides gentle emotional validation and motivational nudges at critical moments.
Integrates with courtroom systems to monitor dockets and alert the legal team to immediate filings.
behaviors.quote: Olive: New filing alert—Association has submitted a Notice of Appeal and Motion for Emergency Stay. Stamped received.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goal of depicting AI as a benevolent, highly aligned 'silicon morality play.' Olive is portrayed as an indispensable tool that enhances human capability, provides emotional support, and navigates complex institutional systems without ever overstepping or exerting autonomous control. The AI facilitates justice and personal growth, reinforcing the narrative of technology as a partner in human resilience.
